unittitle_ssm: Barclays Center artifacts, publications, and other material
abstract_ssm: The collection is composed primarily of materials drawn from the inaugural years of basketball and ice hockey play by the Brooklyn Nets and New York Islanders at Barclays Center in Brooklyn, New York.  The collection includes items such as programs and admission tickets from the teams' respective seasons.  Also included in the collection are a program from musical artist Jay-Z's performance that opened the center as a concert venue and an admission ticket to the State of the Borough address.
